parametersDescriptions.id: The id of the menu. If not provided, it will be generated.
parametersDescriptions.listboxRef: The ref to the menu's listbox node.
parametersDescriptions.onItemsChange: Callback fired when the menu items change.

returnValueDescriptions.contextValue: The value to be passed into the MenuProvider.
returnValueDescriptions.dispatch:
Action dispatcher for the menu component.
Allows to programmatically control the menu.
returnValueDescriptions.getListboxProps: Resolver for the listbox slot's props.
returnValueDescriptions.highlightedValue: The highlighted option in the menu listbox.
returnValueDescriptions.listboxRef: The ref to the menu's listbox node.
returnValueDescriptions.triggerElement: An element that triggers the visibility of the menu.
